title: 2nd Prize at Engineering Project Showcase 2019
description: Himank Sharma, Ayush Gawhane, Thiruvesh, and Saushtav Roy won 2nd prize in the Engineering and Biotechnology category at the Second Annual Engineering Project Showcase.

title: Research Presentation at ICRTSEM 2019
description: Himank Sharma presented his research on 'Measurement of spine parameters and possible scoliosis cases with surface Topography Techniques: A case study with Indian young population' at the 3rd International Conference on Research on Recent Trends in Science, Engineering and Mathematics 2019 in Goa.

title: 1st Prize - Portable ECG Device
description: Akhil, Ashish, Mansa, and Ramana R. won 1st prize in the Robotics and Sensors category for their 'Portable ECG Device'.

title: 2nd Prize - Robotics and Sensors
description: Priyanshu, Raghav, Raghav, Nishtha, and Raghav won 2nd prize in the Robotics and Sensors category.

title: 2nd Runner Up - Technovation Hackathon 2
description: Team won 2nd Runner Up at Technovation Hackathon Smart City 2.

title: Selected for SIH 2020 Finale
description: Team HEXA-TECHIES and Team FORTIFY selected for the Smart India Hackathon (SIH 2020) finale.

title: Line Follower Competition Winner - SNU
description: Congratulations to the team on winning the Line Follower Competition conducted at Shiv Nadar University (RoboYantriki).
